title: Make Up Your Mind
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Billie Eilish]
I hate myself, well, maybe that's the reason I love you
I know too well, that what you say is separate from what you do
[Chorus: Billie Eilish & MELVV, 
Billie Eilish
]
Make up your mind
Babe, we're running out of time
Can't wait, forever
Starstruck, and blind
Never owed you my heart
If we get together, da-da
[Post-Chorus: MELVV & 
Billie Eilish
]
'Cause all I want is someone
To make me feel a little more like you used to
And you just heard every dream
I wake up crying, wishing I was lying next to you
[Refrain: Billie Eilish & MELVV & 
 Billie Eilish
]
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Don't know what you want me to do at all
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum

[Verse 2: Billie Eilish]
You make me weak, you make me feel so naked
You see right through
I can't quite grieve
Praying for your call is all I do
[Chorus: Billie Eilish & MELVV, 
Billie Eilish
]
Make up your mind
Babe, we're running out of time
Can't wait, forever
Starstruck, and blind
Never owed you my heart
If we get together, da-da
[Post-Chorus: MELVV & 
Billie Eilish
]
'Cause all I want is someone
To make me feel a little more like you used to
And you just heard every dream
I wake up crying, wishing I was lying next to you
[Refrain: Billie Eilish & MELVV & 
 Billie Eilish
]
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Don't know what you want me to do at all
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum 
(We're running out of time)
Da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da, da-da-da-dum

[Outro: Billie Eilish]
I hate myself, well, maybe that's the reason I love you
